snippet: Milton Bradley, a former Los Angeles Dodgers and Seattle Mariners outfielder, has been charged with abusing his estranged wife, city prosecutors in Los Angeles said.
abstract: Former MLB outfielder Milton Bradley is charged with abusing his estranged wife.
lead_paragraph: Milton Bradley, a former Los Angeles Dodgers and Seattle Mariners outfielder, has been charged with abusing his estranged wife, city prosecutors in Los Angeles said.

headline.seo: Abuse Charge for the Former Outfielder Milton Bradley
headline.main: Abuse Charge for the Former Outfielder Milton Bradley
